title: _WHEA_ERROR_RECORD_HEADER_VALIDBITS (ntddk.h)
description: The WHEA_ERROR_RECORD_HEADER_VALIDBITS union describes which members of a WHEA_ERROR_RECORD_HEADER structure contain valid data.
